title: About
preamble: I'm a software developer based in London ON with vast array of skills and interests. I'm currently enrolled at Fanshawe College studying Computer Programming and Analysis, and I am a graduate of Western University having studied Music and Philosophy.

content.heading: Goals
content.text:
I am actively seeking opportunities that will enable me to apply my knowledge in a real-world setting and contribute to meaningful projects.
I am eager to learn from experienced professionals and contribute meaningfully to innovative projects.

content.heading: Skills
content.text: I am proficient in applying the following key skills:
skills: Quickly learning and applying new technologies and methodologies
Efficiently managing time, prioritizing tasks, and meeting deadlines
Applying critical thinking skills to evaluate situations and make informed decisions
Being self-motivated and taking initiative for personal and professional growth
Remaining committed to continuously learning and staying updated with industry trends
Adapting to changing project requirements and embracing new methodologies

content.heading: Technologies
content.text: My technical background spans a diverse range of programming languages, frameworks, and tools. I am proficient in the following technologies:

content.heading: Education
content.text:
I started my academic journey with a Bachelor's degree in Music and Philosophy from the University of Western Ontario. Over time, my interest in technology and software development grew, which led me to shift my focus to the tech.
Right now, I'm studying Computer Programming and Analysis at Fanshawe College, where I'm working on improving my software development skills and learning more about the industry. To keep up with the latest trends and technologies, I supplement my education with online courses. Here are some of the courses I've completed or am currently working on:

courses.title: SQL and PostgreSQL: The Complete Developer's Guide

content.heading: Interests
content.text:
Iâ€™m deeply passionate about keeping up with industry trends and exploring new technologies. I enjoy creating user-friendly and visually engaging applications, often drawing on my arts background to transform ideas into functional software.
Beyond coding, I have a variety of interests, including cooking, gardening, biking, watching professional wrestling, and exploring a diverse array of music. I also have a strong interest in analytic philosophy, particularly in its intersection with computer science. I admire the works of Gottlob Frege, Bertrand Russell, and Ludwig Wittgenstein with their contributions to the philosophy of language and logic, and their influence on the field of computer science.
